about_the_game: Smipat and the Lost Bones ​is a 2D Action RPG with leveling, Hack & Slash elements and puzzles. The game is greatly inspired by the old Legend of Zelda games. In this demo you will be introduced to the games core mechanics and feel. The demo contains a few puzzles and a few different monster, this will take place in three different themes. Good luck with beating it and we hope you will enjoy.

short_description: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.
